text: Grzegorz Piesio (born July 17, 1988 in Garwolin) is a Polish footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Kotwica Kołobrzeg. ==Career== In the beginning of August 2019, Piesio joined Kotwica Kołobrzeg.Transferowy hit Kotwicy Kołobrzeg. title: Grzegorz Piesio
